name: CYBERKRIME ULTRAFORCE BABYZONE 5800
description:
In a cyberpunk world where murders are forewarned but can't be prevented, how do crimes play out?

You take on the role of KIM, a 20 year old ex-rebel Transhumanist Cybergöte who loves fighting Krime. Solve odd murder mysteries in this cop flick point-and-click adventure where you're always the witness to the crime you must solve!

Art, Programming and Story: Zizou
Music: Patrik Pettersson

Follow us on twitter! @TombOfFriends
Made in 7 days for the Cyberpunk Jam 2019. 

Please rate us if you enjoy the game!
